description: With the new formation of the BBA comes a new formation of the Bladebreakers Team! But not everyone is excited about the changes. This causes a major rift between two of the top Bladebreakers, causing one of them to join a rival team!
name: Vol. 10

description: Tyson, Daichi and the Chief learn that a new type of advanced Beyblade will be used in the third stage of the Great Beyblade Cup. But these Beyblades use "Heavy Metal" technology--making them almost impossible to control! On the opposing team, Tyson's friend Ray has developed an aggressive new battling style. What has caused this transformation in his personality? And more important, who will claim victory?!
name: Vol. 12

description: The slam-bang wrestling maxiseries continues! A secret mission takes Big Daddy away from his son, Danny Danger, and into the clutches of some old foes from the wrestling ring. Meanwhile, the dejected Danny has a run-in with some neighborhood toughs, but gets advice on getting even from an unexpected source.
name: Hittin' The Mat!

description: The no-holds-barred maxi-series continues! Think Big Daddy Danger's relationship with his son couldn't get any worse? Well, is it a bad sign that Little Danny Danger's in Big Daddy's opponent's corner for the big wrestling match? It sure is, especially when that opponent is none other than Daddy's brother, Diablo X! Who's gonna cry "uncle" now?
name: Out & A Bout

description: Wrestling's greatest hero faces his greatest threat yet! Defeated in the ring for the first time, Big Daddy receives another blow as his own son betrays him! What mysterious hold does the dreaded Diablo X hold over young Danny Danger? And what fearsome menace does the ultimate heel have in store for the whole world?
name: Danger Times Two

description: With the forces of hell overrunning every corner of the globe, Big Daddy Danger decides to take the battle to their home dimension! Now he must face the demons' champion in pitched combat for no less than the fate of the world! Hell's a poppin' as Big Daddy Danger faces what may be his final bout!
name: Big Danger Daddy

description: As Big Daddy faces off against the champion of an alien race, Danny Danger makes a shocking discovery about the family business. Even if Daddy survives his fight, there's a devilish new problem waiting for him at home!
name: The Challenge

description: It's a family affair when Big Daddy's brother Diablo X makes his move...with Dana Danger as his target! Who's behind Diablo's latest attack? And what role will Little Danny Danger play when the battle moves to a hellish dimension? The ultimate grudge match is on!

In a hellish realm of fire and demons, Big Daddy faces his brother in pitched combat! The stakes: Daddy's soul! And as one battle ends, the greatest tag-team match in history begins. But what foe is big enough to unite the entire Danger family?

The slam-bang conclusion is here! The lords of the wrestling ring converge as Big Daddy faces his greatest challenge yet! What will be the ultimate fate of Big Daddy, wife Dana, son Danny, and brother Diablo? Which masked champion will reign supreme? You'd have to be a heel to pass this one up!
Join Big Max, the world's nicest super-powered gorilla, as he faces off against the silent- but-deadly threat of... Mr. Mime!

Meet Paul Krutcher, a regular schmoe who's got a little problem with gravity. Not a superhero yarn, just an average guy learning to deal with being planet Earth's first flying human being. What would you do if you could fly? Welcome to a Bizarre New World!

How could a human being actually fly? After Paul's disastrous ordeal in Arizona, what would it take to get him back into the air? What does Paul choose to read when he's on the toilet? All these questions and more may be answered in this exciting second issue!
name: Letting Go

description: The flying man has been discovered, and globally, people weigh in on the implications. Is this a religious event, or an incredible scientific discovery? Come join the chaos as Paul wraps up his incredible personal journey. Also included a special back up story written & drawn by Tone Rodriguez!

volume.name: The Black Coat: A Call to Arms

description:
This issue contains these stories:

  • The Strip
  • Priest
  • Winged Jupiter
  • Adriene All Alone

Plus an article about Gene Day who died suddenly at the early age of 31 and his career in comics and ideas for this series.

Having retrieved the second half of the Sunfury Amulet, Sinbad and his crew race back to the volcanic island of Ma'rut. The wizard Kabrםt Amad and his army of fire demons are hot on their tail, determined to retrieve the powerful magic amulet. Meanwhile, Pots' rescue of Samelia from the Witch Queen Alorana doesn't go as planned as Alorana's guards trap them in her palace chambers, cutting off any chance of escape!
name: Sinbad and the Eyes of Fire: Part Six

volume.name: 1001 Arabian Nights: The Adventures of Sinbad

description: After surviving harrowing assaults from the invading Locust Horde, Jace Stratton and Delta Squad are dispatched to Montevado. Their mission: investigate mysterious seismic activity unlike anything COG command has witnessed. Is it increased Locust activity – or is this the start of something more sinister?
name: Hollow, Part 3

volume.name: The Black Coat: A Call to Arms

description: The main story in this issue is 'Quiet in the Green', a story that was fully and lovingly restored from bad xerox copies of the original art by Gene Day, by his brother David.

Pull up a front-row seat for a violent rampage through Hell! Dr. Occult finally meets up with the mystic alliance in Purgatory, and the new power in Hell threatens to change the meaning of life and death in the DCU!
name: To Reign in Hell / Every Rose Has Its Thorns

description: Joss Whedon's classic "Smile Time" episode of Angel became a cult favorite and led to a comic book sequel, Spike: Shadow Puppets. Now look back at that fan-favorite episode, adapted here into an all-new, three-part miniseries by the Angel: Masks teams of Scott Tipton and original IDW Angel artist David Messina.
name: Part 1

first_appearance_teams.name: Wolfram and Hart, Attorneys at Law

team_credits.name: Wolfram and Hart, Attorneys at Law

description: Dynamite presents their first ever Christmas Special... this time with a twist as we send Ash on a Christmas adventure the likes of which the world has never seen! Will Evil Ash destroy Christmas? Can Good Ash stop Evil Ash from ruining Christmas? Is there really a Santa?
name: One Shot

volume.name: Army of Darkness: Ash's Christmas Horror

description: On a distant world under a red sun, Superman and Supergirl struggle to survive. Encountering a strange tribe of aliens, Superman is given a vision of the future while Supergirl is left to fend for herself. Elsewhere the Apokoliptian woman known as Maelstrom continues her quest to become the bride of evil incarnate!
name: Maelstrom, Part 4

description: June, 1944: Five long years of endless combat have taken their toll on the once invincible German war machine. The Red Army is on a year long offensive in the East while Allied forces amass in Britain for the largest amphibious assault in history. But Germany's greatest superweapon threatens to turn the tide of battle once and for all: the dreaded Electric Cannon can rain unparalleled destruction across all of Britain, the English Channel, and the Eastern Front. Sounds like a job for Atomic Robo! But is that exactly what the Nazis were hoping for?
name: It's A Lovely Day Tomorrow

description: Find out what's in store for John Crichton, Aeryn Sun, Rygel, Chiana, and the rest of the Moya crew!
name: The Beginning Of The End Of The Beginning, Part One: Return Of The King

description: On the mean streets of Port Nocturne, justice is blonde. Join writer Christopher Mills and Eisner Award-winning artist Joe Staton as they crack open the case files of crime fiction's most unusual sleuth in an attempt to unmask the mystery woman known only as Femme Noir!
name: Blonde Justice

volume.name: Femme Noir: The Dark City Diaries

description: A husband's bad luck at cards results in a violent, twisted web of lies, blackmail, murder, and an explosive climax at sea with Port Nocturne's beautiful and deadly protector.
name: Dead Man's Hand

volume.name: Femme Noir: The Dark City Diaries

description: The beautiful, blonde scourge of the Port Nocturne underworld has a formidible new foe to reckon with when an altruistic scientist's invention for peace is corrupted into the bulletproof killer known as the Robot Mobster!
name: Killer in Steel

volume.name: Femme Noir: The Dark City Diaries

description: When an ancient and powerful artifact is stolen from the natives of an uncharted island by a group of unscrupulous adventurers, its beautiful young protector, Okona, Queen of Monster Isle, follows it to the "Concrete Jungle" of Port Nocturne with revenge in her heart and a spear in her hand.
name: Concrete Jungle

volume.name: Femme Noir: The Dark City Diaries

description: Hellcat is still on the case, tracking the missing heir of an Eskimo witch coven. But hot on the trail of Pete the Yeti, whose rocket powered spruce is making her life difficult. But with the aid of a giant magical wolf named Manslayer and a giant talking Mayan calendar made of stone, she just might survive her trek through the last frontier. If she doesn't drown in a wave of snow bunnies first.
name: Snowball Effect, Part 4

description: It began as an ordinary Saturday night for Marv. He started out at Kadies, watching Nancy's show and having a few drinks, but everything after that is a blur. What is he doing in the projects with a fresh shoulder wound and in the midst of an automobile accident? Before this appears in the upcoming Booze, Broads, & Bullets collection, catch the reprinting of Frank Miller's Sin City Wizard 1/2, featuring brand new front and back covers spotlighting the incomparable Nancy Callahan! Now, if Marv could just remember where he got those gloves. . .

volume.name: Sin City: Just Another Saturday Night

description:
Snow Clone:
Dexter tries to do the impossible and make two snowflakes that look exactly alike.

Debater-2003:
Dexter tries to win in his word fights with Dee-Dee.
name: Snow Clone/ Debater-2003

description: In 1723, corsairs, privateers and pirates still ruled the seas, and the veritable king of the pirates was the notorious Blackbeard... until the world found out he had a daughter! A death bed confession sets Hanna on a worldwide quest to find her father... and kill him. Inspired by Baywatch's Traci Bingham (Host of the 2005 Lingerie Bowl!), swashbuckling has never been so sexy! Nor so dangerous. This new exciting mini-series follows the exploits of Hanna, her sea dog compratriots in her quest for gold, adventure and her fathers head on a stick.

After an imprisonment of five days in Heaven, which equals five years on Earth, Soma is sent to the human world to recover the lost sword. Under the supervision of the heavenly princess Aroomee, Soma must deal with the chaos that his deeds have produced.
name: Vol. 1

description: Fifteen men on a dead man's chest. But in this story, the men happen to be zombies, and they sail with the most blood thirsty female pirate on the Spanish Main. Hanna the pirate continues her quest to find her notorious father Blackbeard, and runs into a dead end!

Fresh from a tangle with Davy Jones' locker, Hanna picks up the scent of the Queen Anne's Revenge, her infamous father's ship. But Blackbeard, ever the cunning scallywag, always seems one step ahead. After several misfires, Hanna puts into motion the plan she thinks will finally net her prey and maybe make her and the crew of the Vengeance rich. But it will put the ship and its crew into more peril than they have ever faced. Is Hanna ready to sacrifice all just to kill her father?

Knowing not only that Soma did in fact steal the Blade of Heaven but also realizing the major role that Soma and company would have in the ultimate battle for heaven and earth, the King of Heaven orders Pretty Old Lady to go down to the mortal world and reveal the secrets of the blade to him. Soma is going to need as much help as he can get now that Barurugo has usurped the throne of Hell and the power that comes with it.
name: Vol. 2

description: As the father and son team of Doksooma and Makumrang square off against Darkling a tragic turn of events unleashes the Kwangama Devil from the Sword of Kwangma. Similiarly, as Soma and company faces the challenge of battling Barurugo, Soma receives the Blade of Heaven journal, which allows him to unleash the devastating power of the Blade. As these two might blades emanate their blinding power, one thing becomes clearly inevitable...the clash of the two blades.
name: Vol. 3

description: Soma wakes up from his coma, but is appalled to learn of the lives that have been lost since the Blade overtook him. The guilt of not being able to save all those lives pushes him into a state of catatonia. The Blade once again takes control, but this time only to guide him and the others to its sister pieces...
name: Vol. 4

description: Soma continues to battle Fan and Yin and ends up falling under Fan's Great Infinite Delusion spell--leaving Soma in a trance-like state. Tan and Kay seize the moment to try and take the Blade from Soma, however, Soma overcomes his inner demons just in time and battles his way out of his trance to face Kay. As Soma and Kay clash, the ensuing explosion of energy reveals the next component of the Blade--the Divine Grace's Heart Sword. Now the melee goes into maximum overdrive.
name: Vol. 5

description: Soma, and friends fell through a whirlpool and plummeted into the depths of the castle under the lake. Soma ultimately meets up with the Eastern Race Wiseman who tells him that he is the chosen owner of the Heart Sword. The Wiseman also tells Soma his shortcomings as a swordsman and what he must do to improve, and ultimately how to correctly wield the now new Chunwangshin Sword!
name: Vol. 6

description: As the castle starts crumbling around them, Soma and Kay fight. Fat Ninja rescues an injured and exhausted Soma. Fat Ninja and Soma fall into the water. Soma drops the Chunwangshin Heart Sword! Kay believes Soma is dead. However, Tan and Shimme inform Princess Aroomee and Kay that Soma is not dead because the Chunwangshin Sword cannot be moved.
name: Vol. 7

description: Sachunsa, a petty thief, is the reincarnation of the legendary warrior Soma. When Sachunsa accepts the quest to save a mute girl from peril death, his dedication to save this girl may cost him his life!
name: Vol. 8

description: In the mid 19th century, the samurai disappeared forever from the face of the world. Or did they? BLADE of KUMORI is the tale of present-day samurai, of warriors steeped in honor carrying on their traditions in the modern world. It's also the tale of a woman who discovers she is something more than a warrior...perhaps even something more than human.

Sting, Leanne McDuff, and Tammy have their hands full protecting Sting's family from assassins. It seems that Sting's father, Major Fleetwood, who has been on the lam for years, is now the primary enemy of a new leader in the military. The assassins lurk in the shadows for their chance to take out the members of Sting's family. Or, are they really just after Sting?
name: Vol. 8

description: Raised in the cloistered environment of her samurai clan, bred to be a warrior, Kumori's been given her first overseas assignment: eliminate an American vigilante! But is he what her employers claim he is? Their battle rages through Manhattan, and results in an aerial confrontation high over the New York skyline, with an outcome neither of them expects!

Kumori is sent to assassinate a rogue scientist involved in the trafficking of nuclear secrets. But after her failure, or more accurately, her refusal, to fulfill her assignment to kill an American vigilante, two "chaperons" accompany her: Her brother and Hiro, the man who loves her. The problem, Tension is building between her and both men, tension that could shatter their close-knit clan. Meanwhile, the "hero" she spared in New York is not content to leave well enough alone...

In the space of a few short months, everything in her life has been called into question. She's defied the will of her family. She's traveled to distant lands and has come to suspect that she is more than human, and that her father knows more about this than he's told her. Now, Kumori faces a crisis that could change her life forever, or force her to kill the man she may love...

Kumori gets a second crack at the vigilante known as "Great White" -- but even as she targets him, both of them are in the crosshairs of the deadly Synth! Kumori must again choose between the will of her family and the man she may love, this time while battling the most dangerous foe she's ever faced. It's a conflict that could destroy her, and everything she holds dear...

Sting may look harmless and naïve, but he's really an excellent fighter and a wannabe bounty hunter in the futuristic Wild West. When he comes across a notice that advertises a reward for the criminal outfit named Gold Romany, he decides that capturing the all-girl gang of bad guys is his ticket to fame and fortune! Filled with a colorful cast of unforgettable characters--Chuck Black, Maria Lopez and Leanne "Fast Sword" McDuff--Min-Seo Park has created one wild tumbleweed tale filled with adventure galore and plenty of shotgun action!
name: Vol. 1

description: Sting does furious battle with a trio of lovelies who call themselves 'Lovely Scorpions.' Meanwhile, Sting, Tammy, and Mark Valentine learn some interesting things about Sting's notorious dad...
name: Vol. 2

description: When Leanne and Sting enter a competition to protect the legendary Gold Gun, Gold Romany shows up with one thing on their mind--to cause chaos! Later, Sting and Leanne take a crack at the Manson Gang, leading our revenge-thirsty duo on a bounty hunt. But little do they know, they are not alone!
name: Vol. 3

description: The Wild West has become wilder. The Manson gang continues on their rampage, and raid a small Indian village. Sting and the Indian chief are close acquaintances, go figure! Sting, Kiske, and Leanne McDuff befriend an Indian warrior and setoff for the Manson gang hideout. On the way, they encounter someone from Leanne's past. Are they finally ready for the final showdown against the Manson gang in the new Wild West?
name: Vol. 4

description: Four Bears and Sting face-off against Manson. Piaa is rescued and returned to her tribe. Sting must go to Method City to protect Cohen, a landowner and holder of the precious "The Heart of the Red Fire Dragon" ruby, from Romany. Sting and gang are confronted by a new enemy, Fire Bomber. They must escape the explosive attacks of this new adversary!
name: Vol. 5

description: The Fire Bomber strikes leaving destruction and despair in his path. Sting vanishes after the large explosion! Tammy vows to revenge on the Fire Bomber. The Fire Bomber taunts Tammy by announcing his next attack at Rumstein Museum. A familiar face greets Tammy in hot-pursuit of the Fire Bomber. Will Tammy be able to put an end to the Fire Bombers explosive terror?
name: Vol. 6

description: Oh man, doesn't the Fire Bomber have a trap set for Sting and Tammy! Sting gets stuck between a rock and a hard place, choosing to rescue Tammy or endanger more lives! Then, Sting must return home to protect his family from a new nemesis. Will he be too late to save what’s left of his family?
name: Vol. 7

description: An interesting concept. Apple Comics printed this book with three , eight page stories of the king of the undead. Each story centers and continues from issue to issue. First story is based on Dracula himself. The second he's floating in ghostform through various times in history . The final story is based in 2199 and Dracula ressurected takes on science. Each story is written by Rickey Shanklin. This is for serious Dracula and vampire enthusuests not to be confused with those emo glowing vampires in some movie series.
